actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-31.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigation and studies of the Committee on Small Business pursuant to rules X and XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides that effective January 3, 1975, the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted pursuant to rules X and XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives, by the Committee on Small Business acting as a whole or by subcommittee, not to exceed $541,500. Stipulates that not to exceed $75,000 of the amount provided by this resolution may be used to procure the temporary or intermittent services of individual consultants or organizations.

titles.title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigation and studies of the Committee on Small Business pursuant to rules X and XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.
